content: Could I get an update from the different client teams how they are coming along with their version releases for devnet 8?

author: marioevz
content:
Hey all, preliminary Devnet-8 hive branch with tests including 4844, 4788, 5656 and 6780 can be found here:
https://github.com/marioevz/hive/tree/cancun-dn8-4844-4788

Please check file `./configs/cancun.yaml` to verify that the execution client is using the correct branch for Devnet-8.

To run Engine API tests use:
```
./hive --sim ethereum/engine --client-file ./configs/cancun.yaml --client <client> --sim.limit "engine-blobs/"
```

To run execution spec tests (EVM tests) use:
```
./hive --sim ethereum/pyspec --client-file ./configs/cancun.yaml --client <client>
```

EVM tests are the ones included in this PR: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/223

EIP-1153 will be included later this week, and if you need any help running the tests please let me or <@755913785620824175> know ðŸ™Œ
(This is execution layer tests only for now)
